remarks: Ring addition operation for the constructed partial vector space A. (Contributed by NM, 11-Oct-2013.)
statement:
dvafvsca.h $e |- H = ( LHyp ` K ) $.
dvafvsca.t $e |- T = ( ( LTrn ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafvsca.e $e |- E = ( ( TEndo ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafvsca.u $e |- U = ( ( DVecA ` K ) ` W ) $.
dvafvsca.s $e |- .x. = ( .s ` U ) $.
dvavsca $p |- ( ( ( K e. V /\ W e. H ) /\ ( R e. E /\ F e. T ) ) -> ( R .x. F ) = ( R ` F ) ) $.
